items.text: full outside off, confident stride forward and defended to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended audaciously late, with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, trying to lure him into having a poke but the batsman does not oblige
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, lets it go again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on off, defended back to the bowler, who finishes a wicket maiden
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.preText: Panda: "Wow Funro this was your opportunity to prove yourself. Have just proved your detractors right that you don't have the mental ability to compete at international level. Typical case"
items.text: length on the pads, pushed to mid-on's right for one
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, too wide to tempt the batman, who lets it through to the keeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short on middle, hardly any bounce and pulled flat and hard to the squareleg fence to get under way
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: overcompensates and pitches full outside off, driven crisply  but can't beat the cover field
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, closes the face and defends towards squareleg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off, squirted away to third-man's right, and he puts in a timely dive to keep it to two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: full on off, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.preText: Dean Weaver: "I don't know why the NZ selectors keep giving Munro chances in the ODI format, he's a T20 specialist. It seems they give him so many chances that if he has 1 good performance, it will justify his inclusion in the ODI World Cup squad. NO!! - He's not good enough in this format."
items.text: length outside off, goes back and defends to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, hint of movement away, Nicholls shuffles across, has a tentative poke and is beaten
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short and wide and swatted past point for four. Mashrafe just released the pressure there
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, bit of width, Guptill throws his bat at it, slices it over point and down to third-man, who makes a meal of it, letting it through his legs, much to the chagrin of the captain
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, FOUR runs
Rubel Hossain to Guptill, no run

items.text: length and drifting in, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, defended to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short on middle and CRACK. Pulled hard and flat, in front of square for four
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on middle, and Guptill just lifts it over the mid-on, who was too far up in the circle. Had he been at the edge, this would have gone down his throat, but instead, it goes over him for four
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length on middle, tucked away to fine-leg's left for two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 2 runs
